meanings.definition: The act of incorporating something again.
meanings.sent1: After the merger, the reincorporation of the two companies was necessary.
meanings.sent2: The reincorporation of the lost documents into the file saved the day.
meanings.sent3: The reincorporation of the missing puzzle piece finally completed the picture.
meanings.sent4: Her return to the team was like a reincorporation of a vital player in a game.
meanings.sent5: The reincorporation of the old recipe brought back memories of family dinners.

meanings.definition: The process of forming a new corporation.
meanings.sent1: The reincorporation of the business was a lengthy but rewarding process.
meanings.sent2: After the bankruptcy, the reincorporation of the company was a fresh start.
meanings.sent3: The reincorporation of the startup brought new energy to the team.
meanings.sent4: The reincorporation of the group felt like a rebirth for the business.
meanings.sent5: The reincorporation of the brand attracted investors looking for growth.
